job.title: Machine Learning/ML Engineer
job.description: Machine Learning/ML EngineerCool Minds LLCLocation: Austin, TX (Remote until Covid) and Candidates who can work in PST will be given the preferenceJob Requirements:5+ years of industry experience or a PhD and in addition, minimum 2 years industry experience in applied Machine learning.Strong coding skills in Python/Java/Scala or equivalentExperience with distributed data processing tools like Hive, Spark, Airflow and popular ML frameworks like Tensorflow or Pytorch is preferredSolid understanding of engineering best practices and complexities of models in productionExperience developing and productionizing machine learning models is a plusExperience with Docker, Kubernetes, Spark is a plusExperience with distributed data processing tools like Hive, Spark, Airflow is a plusIndustry experience building end-to-end Machine Learning Infrastructure a bigplus.
